Name: [Work in Progress] Arctic Holocene Biodiversity Map
Description: Note. This dataset is not complete, as work is ongoing.
Publication: Martin, A.C., Assmann, J.J., Bradshaw, R.H.W., Kuoppamaa, M., Kuosmanen, N.I., Normand, S., Speed, J.D.M., Macias- Fauria, M., 2022. What evidence exists for temporal variability in Arctic terrestrial and freshwater biodiversity throughout the Holocene? A systematic map protocol. Environ Evid 11, 13 (2022). https://doi.org/10.1186/s13750-022-00267-x

BaseLayers.Name: Bioclimate Subzones
BaseLayers.Description: Arctic zonation defined by the Circumpolar Arctic Vegetation Atlas.

Fields.Name: Taxon (inferred as)
Fields.Description: The taxon / taxa that the biotic proxy has been inferred as.

Fields.Name: Biotic Proxy (inferred from)
Fields.Description: The biotic proxy that was recorded, from which a true taxon / taxa have been inferred.

Fields.Name: Inference method
Fields.Description: The inference method used to connect the biotic proxy to a true taxon / taxa.

Fields.Name: Biodiversity Dimension
Fields.Description: The dimension of biodiversity (or 'measure') interpreted from the biotic proxy.

Fields.Name: Origin of Sample
Fields.Description: The parent material from which the biodiversity measure was observed.

Fields.Name: Temporal extent - earliest date
Fields.Description: The earliest (i.e. oldest) date in the time-series

Fields.Name: Temporal extent - latest date
Fields.Description: The latest (most recent) date in the time-series

Fields.Name: Temperature Range
Fields.Description: The difference between the maximum and minimum temperature during the time series

Fields.Name: Precipitation Sum Range
Fields.Description: The difference between the maximum and minimum precipitation sum during the time series

Fields.Name: Temperature - maximum
Fields.Description: The maximum temperature at any point in the time-series, as given by CHELSA

Fields.Name: Temperature - minimum
Fields.Description: The minimum temperature at any point in the time-series, as given by CHELSA

Fields.Name: Precipitation sum - maximum
Fields.Description: The maximum precipitation sum at any point in the time-series, as given by CHELSA

Fields.Name: Precipitation sum - minimum
Fields.Description: The minimum precipitation sum at any point in the time-series, as given by CHELSA

Fields.Name: Publication Year
Fields.Description: The year in which the source was published
